Text: So...the big moment has arrived.
Yes... Are you nervous, Alexia?
D-Don't be absurd...!

...No, actually I am a little nervous. I can't
control the pounding in my chest...

I feel the same way. But this stage fright is
different than what accompanies my official duties,
so there's also a part of me that's enjoying it.

We've put in so much hard work leading up to today.
All that's left is to have fun... That's what Cid,
our producer, said.

Speaking of which, where has our dear producer run
off to? He could have at least said something before
we go on stage...

He mentioned certain preparations in the venue,
something about handing out "glow sticks."

At any rate, let's do what we're here to do!
And don't for get to smile!
...Yeah, let's make this fun!
Hey, what's the assembly for today?

Apparently, it's some school anniversary. I don't
really know what for, though.
Huh, sounds like a drag.

The student council is putting it on, so I suppose
there'll just be some formal address and then done.

Then what're these glowing sticks?
They said somethin' about them responding to magic.
Yeah, I wonder...

Sorry to keep you all waiting. There will now be a
performance by Rose Oriana and Alexia Midgar.
Please give them a large round of applause, everyone.
A performance? Not some boring speech?
...Hnngh! Look, Skel! Look at what they're wearing!

Thank you for coming today, everyone. We truly
appreciate it!

I hope you will all enjoy this performance Alexia
and I prepared for this memorable day!
Now, without further ado...start the musi—
Stop right there!!!
Huh...?

I've come to take over the ceremony! This stage now
belongs to me!
Wh-What?! And just who are you?!

Hehehe... I don't have to answer that. Let me just
say...that I'm a beautiful elven thief with silver
hair and a darling little mole under her eye.
Wait, you're obviously Natsum—
NO, I AM NOT!
Whoa, what the heck is this?
Beats me. But that thief...she really does it for me!
(Alright, the crowd is buzzing. Just as I expected!)
...So, you want me to interrupt their performance?

Yeah, but not for real. Just show up and be like,
"This stage is mine!"

Then when they take you out, everyone will go crazy
as two idols who're strong in a fight but also
super cute are born!

Interesting... So, if I'm going to let them beat me,
how should I dress?

Eh, just wear something that fits the part and a
mask, and you'll be fine. I'll leave that up to you.
Something that fits the part, hm... Understood.

Hehehe... To think the day would come when I can
reap vengeance upon that rotten princess with my
lord's approval!
Uh... Well, do me proud.

(I was kinda uneasy about all this...but all Beta
needs to do is raise a believable amount of chaos
and then take the fall!)

Prepare yourselves! That goes double for you,
Princess Alexia!
She very much seems to despise you. Any idea why?
...No, not really.

Y-You're so shameless...! Well, let's see how you
like this!

Wha...?! Watch what you're doing! Someone could get
hurt!

I will take this stage for myself! Just as you tore
him away from me!!!
Um, I really do think she has it in for you...

And I'm telling you I have no idea what this is
about...

(...Huh? It almost looks like Beta is serious. She's
supposed to just taunt them a bit and then let
herself lose...)

Thieving vixens like you always forget their crimes
so quickly!!!

Seriously, what's this all about?! Get ahold of
yourself, Natsu—
I told you, I'm not Natsume!!!

Um, Alexia! And you, Miss Thief! Please, calm
yourselves...!

(How did this happen? It's like a scene from
a soap opera...)

(Anyway, I gotta up the entertainment factor before
things get too serious!)

(As the producer in the shadow, as a lone side
character, there's only one thing I can do—)
C-C'mon, princess!!! You can do it!!!
That pathetic yelp sounds like...!
Y-Yeah! That goes for both of you!
All we can do is cheer you on...but do your best!
Pooch's voice has stirred up massive support!

(Th-This isn't fair! I want to be cheered on by my
lord too!)

(But he did order me to play the part of the villain
here... Fulfilling my mission comes first!)

Alexia! Let's trounce this thief and take back our
stage!
By all means! We'll do it together, Rose!
